schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare / RBI / NABARD
schemes.description: Provides short-term working capital loans for crop cultivation, allied activities and post-harvest expenses at concessional interest rates.
schemes.benefits: Easy access to credit with interest subvention and flexible repayment options.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers with cultivable land or engaged in allied agricultural activities, subject to bank norms.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Commercial Banks, Cooperative Banks or Regional Rural Banks.

schemes.name: Interest Subvention Scheme for Short-Term Crop Loans
schemes.department: Ministry of Finance / Department of Financial Services
schemes.description: Provides interest subvention on short-term crop loans to reduce the financial burden on farmers.
schemes.benefits: Lower effective interest rate on crop loans.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers availing short-term crop loans through banks and cooperative institutions.

schemes.name: Interest Subsidy on Agricultural Loans – Karnataka Cooperative Banks
schemes.department: Department of Cooperation, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides additional state-level interest subsidy on crop loans issued through cooperative banks.
schemes.benefits: Further reduction in interest burden for cooperative bank borrowers.
schemes.eligibility: Members borrowing through PACS and District Cooperative Banks.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Cooperative Societies or DCC Banks.

schemes.name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
schemes.description: Provides long-term debt financing with interest subvention for post-harvest infrastructure projects.
schemes.benefits: Interest subvention and credit guarantee support.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, Cooperatives, Startups, Entrepreneurs and State Agencies.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through AIF online portal and partner banks.

schemes.name: PMFME – Credit Linked Subsidy Scheme
schemes.description: Provides credit-linked subsidy and working capital assistance to micro food processing enterprises.
schemes.benefits: 35% credit-linked subsidy for eligible processing units.
schemes.eligibility: Individual entrepreneurs, SHGs, Cooperatives and FPOs.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through PMFME portal or State Nodal Agency.

schemes.name: NABARD Refinance Support for Agriculture & Rural Development
schemes.department: National Bank for Agriculture & Rural Development (NABARD)
schemes.description: Provides refinance support to banks for agricultural, allied and post-harvest lending.
schemes.benefits: Improves credit availability in rural and agricultural sectors.
schemes.how_to_apply: Through lending institutions partnered with NABARD.
